metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13464 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in OWASP ModSecurity Core Rule Set (CRS) 3.0.2. Use of X.Filename instead of X_Filename can bypass some PHP Script Uploads rules, because PHP automatically transforms dots into underscores in certain contexts where dots are invalid. msalvatore> For modsecurity, vulnerability is in the test suite. No security impact. msalvatore> There is securty impact for modsecurity-crs

criterions.comment: modsecurity-crs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
